name: Space Garden (PixelCrushers)
description:
Gamepad: stick moves, A lands/jumps, B exchanges flowers

Keyboard: WASD moves, Space lands/jumps, Enter exchanges flowers

A little experiment made for the BIG September 2020 Jam. A nonviolent game about traveling the stars to fill your garden with flowers. 

Uses the themes:

  • Space Travel
  • You Must Leave It Behind
